Package index

Download an OMOP CDM sample dataset

downloadDataset()
Download an OMOP Synthetic dataset.

Create a cdm_reference object from an OMOP CDM sample dataset

cdmFromDataset()
Create a duckdb cdm_reference from a dataset.
cdmFromMetadata()
Create a cdm_reference object from a METADATA file.

Export an OMOP CDM sample dataset

exportDatasetToDuckdb()
Export a dataset to a duckdb database
exportDatasetToFiles()
Export a dataset to files

Utility functions to know the status of the packages

omopDatasets
Available OMOP CDM Synthetic Datasets
availableDatasets()
List the available datasets
isDatasetDownloaded()
Check if a certain dataset is downloaded.
datasetStatus()
Check the availability of the OMOP CDM datasets.
datasetsFolder()
Check or set the datasets Folder
